title: Manage an HR System Integration
description: The company is implementing a new LMS and it needs to be integrated with the existing HRIS.

tasks.description: Work with the vendors to map the data fields between the HRIS and the LMS (e.g., employee ID, name, manager).
tasks.expected_outcome: The HRIS analyst defines the data mapping for the integration.

tasks.description: Configure the API or file transfer process to sync employee data from the HRIS to the LMS daily.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst sets up the scheduled data feed between the two systems.

tasks.description: Run a test sync and validate that employee data appears correctly in the LMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst performs a test run and confirms that a test employee's data is synced correctly.
